title: VCE (HSC) Maths A
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Victorian Curriculum and Assessment Board
brief_description: A program which takes the form of a panel discussion between an examiner for Maths A, a current Year 12 Maths A teacher and two Year 12 students of Maths A. Hosted by Gary Pearson. No other credits available.
